title: S & T 594001 Hair Cord Ties and Bracelet, Clear, 5 Pack
features: Strong grip for all hair types and textures
Won't leave creases or kinks in your hair
description: Remember when phones had cords? Neither do we. These hair cords are inspired by the spiral style of a telephone cord. The spiral helps to eliminate the creases that you would get with a regular hair tie while also being water proof and comfortable. Style your hair any way you want no matter the hair type. Want to let your hair down for while? These hair cords can be a stylish wrist accessory as well.
